snippet: Flush with Abu Dhabi’s wealth, the government-owned Etihad Airlines has emerged as a go-to financier in Europe for struggling rivals, helping raise its global profile.
abstract: Government-owned Etihad Airlines, flush with Abu Dhabi’s wealth, is emerging as go-to financier in Europe for struggling rivals, helping raise its global profile; Etihad once faced stiff resistance from established flag carriers like Lufthansa, British Airways and Air France-KLM, but attitude has changed as Europe's economic crisis erased billions in airline profits and wiped out thousands of jobs, causing them to reach out for financial lifeline.
lead_paragraph: Flush with Abu Dhabi’s wealth, the government-owned Etihad Airlines has emerged as a go-to financier in Europe for struggling rivals, helping raise its global profile.

headline.main: Upstart Abu Dhabi Airline Becomes Ally to European Carriers
headline.print_headline: Upstart Abu Dhabi Airline Becomes Ally to European Carriers
